  • Keyboard Shortcuts

Keyboard ShortcutsÂ¶

Key Function
i Insert Node
d Delete Node
n Create New layer
p Pinch Node
> Next Layer
< Previous Layer
z Zoom
a Reset View (1:1 aspect)
shift+p Pan

Left click selects node to pinch, now change layer and select the node to pinch onto.
